__TOC__

==== Summary ====
* The Tampa Linux meeting of the Florida LoCo was held Saturday, Feb 7, 2009. The attendees set the direction for the next few monthly meetups and we managed to help a fellow member repair his Ubuntu installation. The meeting brought a bunch of new faces and several returning for more! Next meeting will be held on 7 March 2009. 

   http://meetup.com/Tampa-Linux for details!

* The FloridaTeam participated in the Ubuntu Global Bug Jam.  We met several new contributors and triaged over a hundred bugs.
* Planning continues for the 3/9/2009 Florida Linux Show.  Ubuntu Florida will be exhibiting and demoing Ubuntu and new Jaunty features.
* Next Meeting Date 3/3/2009
